submit proofs that were verified off-chain by NovaNet's Jolt-Atlas prover Architecture: 1. Agent generates zkML proof off-chain via NovaNet prover service 2. Proof is verified off-chain (4-12 seconds, ~48KB) 3. Agent signs the verified proof commitment 4. This contract validates signature + policy constraints 5. If valid, executes the Morpho operation This enables trustless autonomous DeFi without expensive on-chain SNARK
